member.name: M:Songhay.Publications.MarkdownEntryUtility.PublishEntryFor11Ty(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.DateTime)

The name of the file in the entry directory.
member.returns: Returns the path of the published file.
member.remarks: When the publication date is one day later or more than the entry incept date new eleventy will be generated and the presentation file will be renamed accordingly.

member.name: T:Songhay.Publications.Models.IndexEntry
member.summary: Implements .
member.remarks:
The opinion here is that this class demonstrates the advantages of Typescript over a “classic” OOP language.
The ability to cast an anonymous object into an interface would eliminate the need for this class.
For more detail, see https://github.com/dotnet/roslyn/issues/13#issuecomment-70338359
